Package cs3500.easyanimator.model.actions

Interface ISynchronisedActionSet

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<ISynchronisedActionSet>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ASynchronisedActionSet, SynchronizedActionSetImpl
public interface ISynchronisedActionSet
extends java.lang.Comparable<ISynchronisedActionSet>
Represents an interface of a synchronized action. A synchronized action is a list of actions on a given shape that all share the same tick. Implements ISynchronisedActionSet. The simplest form of an action is an empty list of commands and a given amount of time.

      void applyAnimation​(IShape shape)

    • getCommandList

      java.util.ArrayList<IActionCommand> getCommandList()
      Outputs an ArrayList of all of the IActionCommand associated with this shape for this given time period.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of the commands.

    • removeCommand

      void removeCommand​(int i)
      Removes a command from an ISynchronisedActionSet.
      Parameters:
      i - the index that holds the IActionCommand to be removed.

    • containsInstanceOf

      boolean containsInstanceOf​(IActionCommand ac)
      Returns a boolean that specifies whether an ISynchronisedActionSet contains an instance of a particular IActionCommand. This is used to avoid inconsistent shape states in an ISynchronisedActionSet.
      Parameters:
      ac - the IActionCommand class that is being searched for.
      Returns:
      true if the IActionCommand class is contained within the searched ISynchronisedActionSet.
